page.title: 07Church in Ingleton
page.content: There are about seven or eight weddings a year.Some of the land the church is built on keeps moving away and that's why the church has been built so many times.The new room was built because the old Parish Room wasn't very satisfactory and they more or less wanted something on the same premises.Steven Wright did the building of the new room and Mr Howson did the electrics.Mr Lawson did the plumbing work.The new room is used for all sorts of things like Sunday School parties, private events, meetings and organisations.Reverend Wray,the Vicar of Ingleton told us that the present church will last for about another twenty_five years before it is in danger of beginning to collapse again.A lot of work to strengthen the foundations will have to be done.
